database.name: VIEW M_TRANSACTION_V
database.view: SELECT t.ad_client_id, t.ad_org_id, t.movementdate, t.movementqty, t.m_product_id, t.m_locator_id, p.m_product_category_id, p.value, po.c_bpartner_id, po.pricepo, po.pricelastpo, po.pricelist FROM m_transaction t, m_product p, m_product_po po WHERE t.m_product_id = p.m_product_id AND t.m_product_id = po.m_product_id AND po.iscurrentvendor = 'Y'
